item.description:
In this class we will focus on techniques to make fine silver pendants or charms to be used for necklaces, bracelets and/or earrings. We will cover design, adding texture, rolling, polishing and finishing. No experience is needed. This class is appropriate for beginners and those looking to refine their skills.


This is a two part workshop consisting of two 2-hour sessions. The class fee covers 20g pack of clay and in-class use of all necessary tools and stamps needed to make your one of a kind pendants and/ or earrings. You can also add a patina using liver of sulfur.

Dates: Sunday, November 29 and Sunday, December 6 at 12pm
Duration: Two 2-hour sessions. Plan to attend both sessions.
Fee: $135
Skill Level: Ages 14+

Please call Abeille at 617.232.4343 to register or register online at Abeille

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: PMC Basics - Pendant and Charms (2 Sessions)
